title: 322: CHATTY BROS: Gray’s Trip Takes a Turn + Most Embarrassing Moments + Little Bit of Bach + More!
itunes:title: 322: CHATTY BROS: Gray’s Trip Takes a Turn + Most Embarrassing Moments + Little Bit of Bach + More!
description:
It’s Bro time, Broads! Grayston is back to tell the #broadsquad all about his trip and it takes QUITE a turn. Then The Bros chat future “Dear Bro”, “Plug Somethin’”, eat Pop Rocks, discuss their most embarrassing work moments, play some “Would You Rather…?”, and cover some of their recent thoughts on Michelle’s Bachelorette Season! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PUBLIC REC: Go to PUBLICREC.COM and use our code CHATTY to receive 10% off! 

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY125 and use code CHATTY125 to get $125 off + free shipping!

***BLUELAND: get 15% off your first order when you go to BLUELAND.COM/CHATTY

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
